paper.title: Heterogeneous Retirement Savings Strategy Selection with Reinforcement Learning
paper.abstract: Saving and investment behaviour is crucial for all individuals to guarantee their welfare during work-life and retirement. We introduce a deep reinforcement learning model in which agents learn optimal portfolio allocation and saving strategies suitable for their heterogeneous profiles. The environment is calibrated with occupation- and age-dependent income dynamics. The research focuses on heterogeneous income trajectories dependent on agents' profiles and incorporates the parameterisation of agents' behaviours. The model provides a new flexible methodology to estimate lifetime consumption and investment choices for individuals with heterogeneous profiles.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用深度强化学习模型来优化个人退休储蓄策略，包括投资组合分配和储蓄策略，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。论文明确提到研究目标是优化投资组合分配和储蓄策略，适用于具有不同收入轨迹的个人，因此其主要应用领域是投资组合管理。
